mapper.select: select * from prescribe as p left join collecting as c on p.prescribe_code = c.prescribe_code left join register as r on c.barcode = r.barcode and r.prescribe_code = c.prescribe_code left join visit as v on p.visit_code = v.visit_code where p.status_code = "D" and c.cancel_barcode_dt is null and c.cancel_collecting_dt is null;

select * from register as r left join collecting as c on r.barcode = c.barcode and r.prescribe_code = c.prescribe_code left join prescribe as p on c.prescribe_code= p.prescribe_code left join order_slip as o on p.order_code = o.order_code left join visit as v on v.visit_code = p.visit_code left join patient as pat on pat.patient_no = v.patient_no
where left(r.register_dt, 10) between #{stDate} and #{endDate}
where r.barcode LIKE concat('%',#{barcode},'%')
ORDER BY r.register_dt DESC
select * from conclusion as c left join register as r on c.register_code = r.register_code where r.barcode = #{barcode} ORDER BY c.inspection_code ASC

select c.prescribe_code from collecting as c left join prescribe as p on c.prescribe_code = p.prescribe_code left join order_slip as o on o.order_code =p.order_code where c.barcode = #{barcode} and o.order_code=#{orderCode};
